title: Chromatic Dragon Scales (dNetHack)
data:
| \[   Chromatic Dragon Scales   *(No tile)* |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
| ------------------------------------------ | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Base item                                  | [black dragon scales](/wiki/Black_dragon_scales "Black dragon scales")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
|                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
| Affiliation                                | - [Chromatic Dragon](/wiki/Chromatic_Dragon "Chromatic Dragon")
- [unaligned](/wiki/Unaligned "Unaligned")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
| When carried                               | none                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
| When worn                                  | * can safely be converted to [mail or shield](/wiki/Dragon_armor_\(dNetHack\) "Dragon armor (dNetHack)")
* [fire resistance](/wiki/Fire_resistance "Fire resistance")
* [cold resistance](/wiki/Cold_resistance "Cold resistance")
* [shock resistance](/wiki/Shock_resistance "Shock resistance")
* [poison resistance](/wiki/Poison_resistance "Poison resistance")
* [disintegration resistance](/wiki/Disintegration_resistance "Disintegration resistance")
* [drain resistance](/wiki/Drain_resistance "Drain resistance")
* [acid resistance](/wiki/Acid_resistance "Acid resistance")
* [stoning resistance](/wiki/Stoning_resistance "Stoning resistance")
* [immunity to sickness](/wiki/Immunity_to_sickness "Immunity to sickness") |
| When invoked                               | none                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |

| Base price                                 | 9000 [zm](/wiki/Zorkmid "Zorkmid")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
| Weight                                     | [150](/wiki/Weight "Weight")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |

The **Chromatic Dragon Scales** appear as an [artifact](/wiki/Artifact "Artifact") in [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack"), [notdNetHack](/wiki/NotdNetHack "NotdNetHack") and [notdNetHack](/wiki/NotdNetHack "NotdNetHack"). The artifact is [unaligned](/wiki/Unaligned "Unaligned"), and its [base item](/wiki/Base_item "Base item") is a set of [black dragon scales](/wiki/Black_dragon_scales "Black dragon scales").

## Generation

The Chromatic Dragon Scales cannot be randomly generated or [wished](/wiki/Wish "Wish") for.

The [Chromatic Dragon](/wiki/Chromatic_Dragon "Chromatic Dragon") always leaves behind the Chromatic Dragon Scales along with her [corpse](/wiki/Corpse "Corpse") upon death.

## Description

While worn, the Chromatic Dragon Scales confer 3 AC and several properties in addition to [disintegration resistance](/wiki/Disintegration_resistance "Disintegration resistance") and [drain resistance](/wiki/Drain_resistance "Drain resistance"): [fire resistance](/wiki/Fire_resistance "Fire resistance"), [cold resistance](/wiki/Cold_resistance "Cold resistance"), [shock resistance](/wiki/Shock_resistance "Shock resistance"), [poison resistance](/wiki/Poison_resistance "Poison resistance"), [acid resistance](/wiki/Acid_resistance "Acid resistance"), [stoning resistance](/wiki/Stoning_resistance "Stoning resistance"), and [immunity to sickness](/wiki/Immunity_to_sickness "Immunity to sickness"). When matching with other [dragon armor](/wiki/Dragon_armor_\(dNetHack\) "Dragon armor (dNetHack)") for the purpose of enabling a [breath](/wiki/Breath "Breath") weapon or boosting the breath weapon of [half-dragons](/wiki/Half-dragon "Half-dragon"), Chromatic Dragon Scales is treated as black, red, blue, white, yellow, and green dragon armor.

The Chromatic Dragon Scales can be converted into a [dragon scale mail](/wiki/Dragon_scale_mail "Dragon scale mail") or [dragon scale shield](/wiki/Dragon_scale_shield "Dragon scale shield") with the same properties and appropriate AC.

- *This page is a **[stub](/wiki/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by [**expanding this page**.](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Chromatic_Dragon_Scales_\(dNetHack\)\&action=edit)*

[![This article describes a 3.4.3-based variant of NetHack. Click here for more information.](/images/5/5d/Nh343var-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article describes a 3.4.3-based variant of NetHack. Click here for more information.")
html:
Chromatic Dragon Scales (dNetHack)

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
[   Chromatic Dragon Scales   (No tile)
Base item black dragon scales
Affiliation
  • Chromatic Dragon
  • unaligned
When carried none
When worn
  • can safely be converted to mail or shield
  • fire resistance
  • cold resistance
  • shock resistance
  • poison resistance
  • disintegration resistance
  • drain resistance
  • acid resistance
  • stoning resistance
  • immunity to sickness
When invoked none
Base price 9000 zm
Weight 150

The Chromatic Dragon Scales appear as an artifact in dNetHack, notdNetHack and notdNetHack. The artifact is unaligned, and its base item is a set of black dragon scales.

Generation

The Chromatic Dragon Scales cannot be randomly generated or wished for.

The Chromatic Dragon always leaves behind the Chromatic Dragon Scales along with her corpse upon death.

Description

While worn, the Chromatic Dragon Scales confer 3 AC and several properties in addition to disintegration resistance and drain resistance: fire resistance, cold resistance, shock resistance, poison resistance, acid resistance, stoning resistance, and immunity to sickness. When matching with other dragon armor for the purpose of enabling a breath weapon or boosting the breath weapon of half-dragons, Chromatic Dragon Scales is treated as black, red, blue, white, yellow, and green dragon armor.

The Chromatic Dragon Scales can be converted into a dragon scale mail or dragon scale shield with the same properties and appropriate AC.

This page is a stub. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by expanding this page.
